targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "cluster_name" = 'cinder' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^5/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'GET' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'POST' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'PUT' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_method" = 'DELETE' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_check_api" WHERE "service" = 'cinder-api' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^2/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^1/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^3/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^4/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_http_responses" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$server/ AND "http_status" =~ /^5/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "haproxy_backend_servers" WHERE "backend" = 'cinder-api' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "haproxy_backend_servers" WHERE "backend" = 'cinder-api' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "service" = 'scheduler' AND "state" = 'disabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "service" = 'volume' AND "state" = 'disabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "service" = 'backup' AND "state" = 'disabled' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "service" = 'scheduler' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "service" = 'volume' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "service" = 'backup' AND "state" = 'up' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "service" = 'scheduler' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "service" = 'volume' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_services" WHERE "service" = 'backup' AND "state" = 'down' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes" WHERE "state" = 'available' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes" WHERE "state" = 'in-use' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes" WHERE "state" = 'error' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT max("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes" WHERE "state" = 'available' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes" WHERE "state" = 'in-use' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes" WHERE "state" = 'error' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes_size" WHERE "state" = 'available' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes_size" WHERE "state" = 'in-use' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes_size" WHERE "state" = 'error' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT max("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes_size" WHERE "state" = 'available' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

SELECT max("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volumes_size" WHERE "state" = 'error' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volume_creation_time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volume_creation_time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volume_creation_time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT min("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_volume_creation_time" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_snapshots" WHERE "state" = 'available' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_snapshots" WHERE "state" = 'in-use' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_snapshots" WHERE "state" = 'error' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT max("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_snapshots" WHERE "state" = 'available' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_snapshots_size" WHERE "state" = 'error' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT max("value") FROM "openstack_cinder_snapshots_size" WHERE "state" = 'available' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

list.name: server
list.query: show tag values from pacemaker_local_resource_active with key = hostname

list.name: Status
list.query: select title,tags,text from annotations where $timeFilter and cluster = 'cinder'
